```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(readr); library(dplyr); library(stringr); library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
library(readr)
libraryData <- read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/tpemartin/github-data/master/library100_102.csv")
```

```{r}
libraryData <- as.data.frame(libraryData)
libraryData[6,]  %>%
  as.factor %>%
  levels -> strongeLocation
```

```{r}
libraryData[6,] <-
  as.factor(libraryData[6,])
levels(libraryData[6,]) -> storageLocations
```

```{r}
storageLocation_i <- storageLocations[i] 
numericalIndexForSubsample<-which(libraryData[6,] ==storageLocation_i)
subsample_i <- libraryData[numericalIndexForSubsample,]
borrowCount_i <- nrow(subsample_i)
```

```{r}
i<-2
storageLocation_i <- storageLocations[i] 
numericalIndexForSubsample<-which(libraryData[6,] ==storageLocation_i)
subsample_i <- libraryData[numericalIndexForSubsample,]
borrowCount_i <- nrow(subsample_i)
```
